Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: RecFlix - Personalized Movie Recommendation Platform

Features:
- FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL and Redis
- Next.js 14 frontend with TailwindCSS, Framer Motion, Zustand
- Hybrid recommendation engine \(MBTI 35% + Weather 25% + Personal 40%\)
- Weather-based theming \(sunny/rainy/cloudy/snowy\)
- User authentication with JWT
- Movie search with autocomplete, filters, infinite scroll
- Ratings and favorites system
- Responsive mobile design with bottom navigation

Pages:
- Home with weather banner and personalized recommendations
- Movie search with genre/sort filters
- Movie detail page with cast, similar movies
- Favorites list
- My ratings list
- Login/Signup with MBTI selection
- Profile settings

Deployment:
- Docker and docker-compose configuration
- Vercel config for frontend
- Railway config for backend
- Environment variable templates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
